# authorizationViewDidAuthorize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sent to the delegate to indicate the user was authorized and the authorization view was changed to unlocked.

## Declaration

```swift
func authorizationViewDidAuthorize(_ view: SFAuthorizationView!)
```
